channel.title: Vladimir Zhirinovsky on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Vladimir Zhirinovsky on Rusland 1

item.title: Learning Russian with News
item.description: Series Yaroslava Russian has quite a range. From Prigozhin’s Plane Crash (2023, 29 m) to a Documented Alien (2024, 27 m). Collected in a playlist , including. 7 years in jail for anti-war price tag protest (2023, 23 m) New Argentinian president deports all Russians from Argentina (2023, 23 m) Russian President resigns in New Year’s night (2024, 55 m) Russia might have a new candidate for president (2024, 36 m) The biggest meteor in 100 years Explodes in Chelyabinsk, Russia (2024, 30 m) Victory Day | Germany’s Surrender in WWII (2024, 33 m) Learn Russian with News | Why books in Russia are being censored (2024, 24 m) Article on realnoevremya.
